title: BluDoc Schema
description: BluDoc is a multi-layer document description format enabling exchange with AI in mind

BluDoc.Version.description: The version of the BluDoc format.

DocumentProvider.Name.description: The name of the document provider.

Created.DateTime.description: The date and time when the document was created.

CreatorSoftware.Name.description: The name of the software used to create the document.

CreatorSoftware.Version.description: The version of the software used to create the document.

Document.Languages.description: The list of languages used in the document, represented by their ISO 639-1 codes

Pages.description: An array of pages in the document.

DocumentEssentials.description: An array of essential document details.

DocumentTexts.description: An array of lines of text in the document.
DocumentTexts.title: LineWrapper

DocumentBinaries.description: An array of binary representation of the document.

BluDoc.title: BluDoc
BluDoc.description: The root object representing a BluDoc document.

Label.description: The label of the document essential.

Value.description: The value of the document essential, if applicable.

Text.description: The text representation of the document essential, if applicable.

Location.description: The location details of the document essential, if applicable.

Confidence.description: The confidence level (0.0-1.0) associated with the document essential. Score of -1 indicates no confidence score.

ConfidenceThreshold.description: The threshold value used to determine the confidence level.

Items.description: An array of sub-items representing additional document essentials, if applicable.

ContentType.description: Describes the nature or purpose of the binary content, specifying how the content is intended to be used or its format characteristics.

MediaType.description: The media type of the binary content, e.g., image/png or application/pdf.

FileName.description: The file name of the content, e.g., attachment1.pdf

Name.description: The name of the content, e.g., attachment1

Embedding.description: An array of Base64 encoded data strings. For multi-page images, each page is represented as a separate Base64 encoded string. For PDFs, the entire document, regardless of page count, is represented by a single Base64 encoded string.

Reference.description: URL references to the binary content.

Text.description: The concatenated text of all words in the line.

Location.description: The location details of the line.

Words.description: The individual words within the line.

Location.description: The location details of the word.

Page.description: The page number where the element is located.

Left.description: The position of the element from the left on the page in pixels.

Top.description: The position of the element from the top on the page in pixels.

Width.description: The width of the element in pixels.

Height.description: The height of the element in pixels.

Width.description: The width of the page in pixels.

Height.description: The height of the page in pixels.

Dpi.description: The dots per inch (DPI) of the page.

Orientation.description: The orientation of the page (e.g., Portrait or Landscape).

AppliedRotationDegreesClockwise.description: The rotation applied to the page in degrees clockwise.
